name: Application rejected (deemed, dispensed, alternative, bailiff)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name)),

The court has rejected your application ((isDeemedService??for deemed service))((isDispenseService??to dispense with service))((isBailiffService??for bailiff service)). 

Sign into your HMCTS account to see what you can do to progress your ((isDivorce??divorce))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership)): ((signin url))

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Update: your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
